title: chests
body:
is it me or all chests have stopped ?
i played different chars and managed to get S S- S+
i get keys but not even 1 chest for about a month or so

replies.body:
Are you sure you have a chest available? If you launch into the Legacy Client (from the Beta login screen) you can check your profile to see how many chests you can earn or if you're on cooldown waiting for a chest (once a week) to refresh. 

If you're confident you had one available during these S-grade matches, please link me to the match history for the matches so I can take a look.

[available chests](https://s13.postimg.org/98f5kb6sn/chest_available.png)

1. http://matchhistory.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUN1/1576744240/217321395?tab=overview
2.http://matchhistory.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUN1/1576190356/217321395?tab=overview
3.http://matchhistory.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUN1/1562467793/217321395?tab=overview

must be more matches but im not sure where i got S , S- , S+ on the other matches , but on this 3 i got for sure.

You've already earned a chest on all three of these champs during the 2016 season, so that's why you didn't get another chest for these matches. You can only earn **one chest** for each champion each season. Until the new season starts, these chests won't reset for each champion.

Check out our [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for more info, let me know if you have any questions.
